about_the_game:
[Game introduction]

"Zombie Hunter-Survivor" is a Roguelike casual game with the theme of hunting zombies in a doomsday environment. The initial character has only one ballistic trajectory, and the attack attribute is not very good. Choose a Buff to strengthen the character in each level of customs clearance, match your own skill combination route, from weak to invincible! The monsters in the level will continue to rush towards the characters, the number and strength of the monsters will increase with the level of each layer, and each difficulty level needs to clear all zombies within 3 minutes! It is said that no one can challenge the difficulty level of more than 200 layers. . . Golden 3 minutes, what level of difficulty can you stick to your limit? ? !

[Skill operation]

Active skill Q : Rage burst, it can be released when the rage bar is full. After each release of rage, the next rage base damage will be stacked!

Active skill E : Death Acrobatics, expand the attack range of the darts around the character itself and keep it for a certain period of time. You need to collect all 3 darts to learn this skill. 3, 5 can unlock the speed stunt!

[Game Features]

Each buff type has different grades, namely: green, blue, purple, orange, red, rainbow, grade order from low to high, rainbow grade is the highest grade and the rarest Buff.

Every 5 layers, there will be super bosses, kill super bosses to get extra skill chests, the more skill chests you get, the richer the attack methods and unlock more extreme decompression experience! !

Thoughtful collocation

After clearing each level, Buffs will be generated for players to choose freely, especially the idea of ​​matching Buff attributes in the early stage is extremely important.

(When you select a Buff for each level of clearance, you can use gold coins to refresh the Buff with a higher level, or you can choose any previous level in your personal attributes to reshuffle to cover the Buff)

Easy and fun gameplay

The game is mainly based on the battle of quick refresh and quick attack, so that every level of the player is a fun experience of Roguelike+ shooting!

Unique style

The game has a horror atmosphere of zombie theme, the difficulty level is 300 layers, each layer is 3 minutes, with epic and soundtrack, and the personality is outstanding!

Game Background

in 2065 A.D., Dr. Hardt, the evil biological research doctor, extracted biological genes from the legendary vampire prince Phyllis for scientific research, and achieved amazing results three years later. The effect of the immortality gene of the research results slowed down the aging rate of cells, which attracted rich people everywhere who were worried about the end of their lives. Therefore, Dr. Hardt won the star research award of that year, which was unmatched at the moment.
But Hardt was not satisfied with this. He wanted to further improve the effect of perfectionism. Gradually out of control, he began to use living people for research and mastered the mystery. He thought it was the most perfect dose of genetic medicine, but there was an extremely terrible side effect, that is, out of control and infection. Hardt could no longer control out of control of genetic medicine, and finally jumped on an assistant and bit him, The assistant who should have died immediately stood up again in 3 hours and infected more people...
As the captain of the security team, Lehman was ordered to block and clean up all the zombies in Normandy, and his technical supporter Ellie continued to provide genetic drugs to enhance human life activity, so the battle began!

name: Zombie Hunter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Dual Core+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: Clean up the constantly infected zombies! Select the buff type to strengthen yourself, and kill the super boss to obtain the skill chest. Strategy skill Buff combination! Each layer lasts for 3 minutes. The higher the level, the more difficult it is. Each layer is the ultimate Roguelike experience!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, Hungarian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal
